articles.title: In huge N.America opening, ‘Spider-Man’ rakes in $253 million - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Covid-schmovid: Sony and Marvel's new "Spider-Man: No Way Home" scored the third-biggest domestic opening of all time, taking in an estimated $253 million in its massive North American weekend opening.
